item.title: 加州警察和教师住房抵押贷款风险显现裂缝
item.description: 为资助加州警察、教师和护士的住房而发行的高收益市政债券出现了紧张迹象。【原文：High-yield municipal bonds issued to finance housing for police officers, teachers and nurses in California are showing signs of strain.】

item.title: 在出价未达到 75% 的门槛后，荷兰皇家银行取消了收购 Addiko 银行的计划
item.description: 新卢布尔雅那银行（Nova Ljubljanska banka d.d.）因未能说服足够多的股东投标而取消了收购总部位于维也纳的 Addiko 银行的计划。【原文：Nova Ljubljanska banka d.d. scrapped a plan to buy Vienna-based Addiko Bank after failing to persuade enough shareholders to tender their stock.】

item.title: 美元连跌令欧元和英镑创 2024 年新高
item.description: 美元的下滑推动了其他主要货币的反弹，使欧元和英镑创下了 2024 年的新高，因为交易员们都在关注全球利率的未来走势。【原文：The dollar’s slump is fueling rallies in other major currencies, sending the euro and British pound to fresh 2024 highs as traders home in on the path ahead for global interest rates.】

item.title: 特朗普盟友贝森特称股市将因经济 "不稳定 "而下跌
item.description: 经营宏观对冲基金 Key Square Capital Management 的斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）说，他预计美国市场的波动性将大幅上升，并出现下跌，因为经济比大多数投资者认识到的更加脆弱。【原文：Scott Bessent, who runs macro hedge fund Key Square Capital Management, said he expects a jump in volatility and a decline in US markets because the economy is more fragile than most investors realize.】

item.title: 瑞士央行行长乔丹称强势法郎对保持低通胀至关重要
item.description: 瑞士国家银行行长托马斯-乔丹（Thomas Jordan）说，与美国和欧元区相比，瑞士法郎的坚挺在保持低通胀方面发挥了关键作用。【原文：Swiss National Bank President Thomas Jordan said the franc’s strength played a key role in keeping inflation low compared with the US and the euro area.】

item.title: 加拿大企业称罢工会留下伤疤并援助俄罗斯
item.description: 加拿大企业警告说，继去年的罢工之后，如果铁路和港口罢工继续进行，并导致该国重要的贸易动脉瘫痪，那么经济可能会受到长期损害。【原文：Canadian businesses are warning about potential long-term damage to the economy if railway and port strikes go ahead and choke the country’s vital trading arteries, following walkouts last year.】

item.description: 大卫-戈尔（David Goel）曾为对冲基金巨头朱利安-罗伯逊（Julian Robertson）工作，25 年前创办了经纬资本管理公司（Matrix Capital Management）。【原文：David Goel, who worked for hedge fund titan Julian Robertson before launching Matrix Capital Management 25 years ago, is shuttering his $11 billion firm and returning client cash.】

item.title: 变革推动订阅用户增长，Netflix 再创新高
item.description: Netflix 公司股价连续第六个交易日延续涨势，创下历史新高，原因是该公司对其流媒体平台进行了调整，重新点燃了用户和销售增长的激情。【原文：Netflix Inc. shares extended their rally for a sixth session to hit an all-time high as the company’s changes to its streaming platform rekindle subscriber and sales growth.】

item.title: 加拿大帝国商业银行（CIBC）预计 1,600 亿加元将回流加拿大红利股票
item.description: 据加拿大帝国商业银行（Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce）称，经过两年多的反感之后，投资者开始将资金投入多伦多不受欢迎的分红股票。随着加拿大短期利率的不断下调，这一趋势有望进一步扩大。【原文：Investors are starting to plow funds into Toronto’s out-of-favor dividend-paying stocks after more than two years of antipathy, according to Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce. It’s a trend that promises to grow as short-term interest rates in the country continue to be scaled back.】

item.title: Couche-Tard 将在 7 个月内筹集股本；我出价了：分析师
item.description: 分析师称，总部位于魁北克的便利店运营商 Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. 对其全球竞争对手 Seven & i Holdings 的竞购将需要大量的融资手段，包括大规模削减成本、大量股权储备和潜在的美国上市，才能使交易顺利完成。【原文：Quebec-based convenience story operator Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.’s bid for its global rival Seven & i Holdings will take a great deal of financing gymnastics, including massive cost-cutting, a large store of equity and a potential US listing to get the transaction past the finish line, analysts say.】

item.title: 印度央行行长达斯称通胀必须降至 4% 才能降息
item.description: 印度储备银行行长达斯（Shaktikanta Das）表示，印度的通货膨胀率必须在可持续的基础上显示出稳定在央行目标 4% 左右的迹象，然后才能考虑降息。【原文：India’s inflation must show signs of settling around the central bank’s target of 4% on a sustainable basis before a rate cut can be considered, Reserve Bank of India Governor Shaktikanta Das said.】

item.title: 巴西央行行长对加息表示怀疑，巴西雷亚尔走软
item.description: 巴西央行行长罗伯托-坎波斯-内托（Roberto Campos Neto）表示，虽然加息已经提上议事日程，但在国际前景改善和预期未来几个月通胀将放缓的情况下，加息的确定性低于市场目前的预测，巴西雷亚尔因此走软。【原文：The Brazilian real weakened after central bank chief Roberto Campos Neto signaled that while interest rate hikes are on the table, they are less certain than markets currently forecast amid an improving international outlook and expectations that inflation will slow in the coming months.】

item.title: 千禧年聘请埃利奥特的霍斯勒负责天然气和电力交易
item.description: 据直接知情人士透露，伊兹-英格兰德（Izzy Englander）的千禧年管理有限责任公司（Millennium Management LLC）聘请卡尔-霍斯勒（Carl Hössler）担任其商品业务的高级投资组合经理。【原文：Izzy Englander’s Millennium Management LLC hired Carl Hössler as a senior portfolio manager for its commodities business, according to people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 华尔街将从美联储会议记录中寻找资产负债表缩表结束的线索
item.description: 随着华尔街对美联储何时完成当前量化紧缩政策的讨论升温，策略师们希望在周三美国央行公布最新政策会议纪要时获得更多指导。【原文：As debate heats up on Wall Street over when the Federal Reserve will complete its current course of quantitative tightening, strategists are looking for more guidance on Wednesday when the US central bank releases the minutes of its latest policy meeting.】

item.title: 绿色电力产量跃升，欧洲电力价格转为负值
item.description: 由于风能和太阳能发电量准备跃升，绿色电力充斥电网，周三欧洲多个市场的电力价格跌破零点。【原文：Power prices in several European markets fell below zero for Wednesday as wind and solar output is poised to jump and flood the grid with green electricity.】

item.title: 埃利奥特在与前 McAfee 部门的债务交易中跃居债权人前列
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）已同意为前 McAfee 部门提供新的流动资金，这笔交易将使该基金在还款方面领先于其他债权人。【原文：Elliott Investment Management has agreed to provide fresh liquidity to a former McAfee unit in a deal that will put the fund ahead of other creditors in the repayment line.】

item.title: 白糖跌至 2022 年低点，供应前景乐观
item.description: 原糖跌至近两年来的最低点，原因是巴西的甘蔗压榨速度加快，以及包括泰国和印度在内的主要生产国的产量有望恢复，这些都提振了供应前景。【原文：Raw sugar dropped to the lowest in nearly two years as the pace of sugarcane crushing in Brazil and an expected recovery in output in key producers, including Thailand and India, boosts the supply outlook.】

item.title: NatWest Markets 称英国低息债券热潮已过
item.description: 根据 NatWest Markets 的数据，英国债券市场中一个为英国富人提供税收减免的小众领域的需求正面临动摇的风险。【原文：Demand for a niche sector of the UK bond market that offers rich Britons a tax break is at risk of faltering, according to NatWest Markets.】

item.title: 克罗格启动美元债券销售，为收购 Albertsons 提供资金
item.description: 克罗格公司（Kroger Co.）周二将利用美国投资级市场，为其收购同类杂货商阿尔伯森公司（Albertsons Cos.）提供资金，这可能是今年最大的公司债券交易之一。【原文：Kroger Co. is tapping the US investment-grade market on Tuesday to help fund its acquisition of fellow grocer Albertsons Cos. in what could be one of the biggest corporate bond deals of the year.】

item.title: 花旗称对冲基金正在利用美元进行新的套利交易
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）称，套利交易卷土重来，但有一个关键区别：对冲基金正在借用美元而不是日元来押注新兴市场。【原文：Citigroup Inc. says the carry trade is back, but with a key difference: hedge funds are borrowing US dollars rather than the yen for their wagers on emerging markets.】

item.title: 亚马逊的人工智能支出计划使其股价无法加入科技股反弹行列
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）的大手大脚是以牺牲利润为代价的，其股价也因此受到惩罚。【原文：More than any of the megacap technology stocks, Amazon.com Inc.’s big spending ways are coming at the expense of profits, and its shares are being punished as a result.】

item.title: 特朗普即将获得兑现媒体份额的许可
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普还有一个月就能把他在社交媒体上的纸面财富变成冷冰冰的硬通货了。问题是，他会吗？【原文：Donald Trump is a month away from being able to turn his paper social-media fortune into cold, hard cash. The question is, will he?】

item.title: 南非将于二月公布私人铁路投资规则
item.description: 南非交通部长芭芭拉-克雷西（Barbara Creecy）表示，南非计划在六个月内完成私营公司使用国有港口和铁路基础设施的框架，此举将有助于政府解决影响经济增长的严重物流制约问题。【原文：South Africa plans to complete a framework for private companies to use state-owned port and rail infrastructure within six months, Transport Minister Barbara Creecy said, a move that could help the government solve severe logistics constraints that have hit economic growth.】

item.title: 随着加密货币应用的激增，尼日利亚证券交易委员会将为加密货币交易所颁发许可证

item.title: 土耳其将利率维持在 50%，等待通胀进一步放缓
item.description: 土耳其中央银行将暂停加息的时间延长了第五个月，这表明该行仍致力于进一步降低世界上最高的通胀率之一，并实现其雄心勃勃的年底目标。【原文：Turkey’s central bank extended its interest-rate pause for a fifth month, signaling it remains focused on further lowering one of the world’s highest inflation rates and reaching its ambitious year-end target.】
